about_the_game:
About the game
A visual novel about a futanari manager and her subordinate. Everything takes a turn when Miss Kyle makes an indecent proposal to Anais.

Visual Novel Description
To everyone's surprise, a hot, tall, and intimidating new manager appears in the company.
Trying to get to know her (female) subordinates better, Miss Kyle invites Anais to her office for a discussion.
The manager starts hitting on the woman and eventually offers her a deal: to do whatever she asks for in exchange for a promotion.
Anais doesn’t think too much and accepts the arrangement.
But will she be prepared for what Miss Kyle has in mind?
What will be her reaction when she finds out what the new manager is hiding in her panties?
Let’s find out together in this erotic visual novel.

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex in still images between a woman and a futanari character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
